channel.title: CVE Feed for FUJI ELECTRIC CO., LTD. and Hakko Electronics Co., Ltd. -- V-Server and V-Server Lite
channel.description: The latest CVEs for FUJI ELECTRIC CO., LTD. and Hakko Electronics Co., Ltd. -- V-Server and V-Server Lite

item.title: CVE-2023-31239|2024-08-02T14:53:30.695Z -- fuji%20electric%20co.%2C%20ltd.%20and%20hakko%20electronics%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- v-server%20and%20v-server%20lite
item.description: Stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability in V-Server v4.0.15.0 and V-Server Lite v4.0.15.0 and earlier allows an attacker to execute arbitrary code by having user open a specially crafted VPR file.
